§n§5astro-ph§r§r
§6§lOn a c(t)-Modified Friedman-Lemaitre-Robertson-Walker Universe§r

§8§oRobert C. Fletcher§r

§72013§r

arXiv:§c§nastro-ph/0610610§r

Journal reference:§1§nAbraham Zelmanov Journal 4 pp182-236 (2011)§r

Version:§7v3 (Mon, 22 Jul 2013 18:53:14 GMT)§r
Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o60 pages, 5 figures. Simplified the definition of \
. Pointed out that direct measurement of c(t) is difficult when measuring tools such as meter sticks vary with c(t). Eliminated suggestion that
c(t) might explain apparent accelerating universe because the simple model of the dependence on c(t) of the radiation from supernova Ia doesn't seem to fit the observed data\u00a7r
arXiv:astro-ph/9912213
